official_title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authorities of the President and the executive branch (formerly subject to congressional veto) with respect to energy actions and energy conservation contingency plans under the Energy Policy and Conservation Act, unless the exercise of such authorities is approved by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.
